name: Telfair Capital
tag_list: asset-based-lending, receivables-factoring, private-equity, working-capital, don-mcgraw, business-loans, private-lender, donmcgraw, business-financing, commercial-lending
overview:
Founded in April, 2010, Telfair Capital is a private investment firm dedicated exclusively to investing through the purchase of receivables in retail, hospitality, distribution, retail services, consulting and consumer products companies positioned for growth.

The firm has established an excellent reputation for its judgement in selecting appropriate companies for investment and its active involvement with portfolio companies in creativity in structuring transactions. Telfair Capital’s principals have an average of almost 15 years of relevant experience and possess a broad range of transactional, financial and investment skills. A hallmark of Telfair Capital has been the significant amounts of personal capital committed by the firm’s professionals to portfolio company investments.

Telfair Capital specializes in providing asset based financing and working capital solutions through a range of credit options.
